sentences.en: ...a poignant combination of beautiful surroundings and tragic history.
sentences.cn: …优美环境与悲怆历史的辛酸结合。

sentences.en: ...a poignant love story.
sentences.cn: …一个令人感伤的爱情故事。

sentences.en: A poignant anxiety thrust itself sharply into Presley's heart.
sentences.cn: 一阵剧烈的焦虑,象把刀子似的,直扎进普瑞斯莱的心房.

sentences.en: A poignant effluence from the object enveloped him.
sentences.cn: 他被对方流露出的真情所包围.

sentences.en: A poignant sense engulfed him of the one - way flow of time.
sentences.cn: 他深感到岁月流逝,一去不回.

sentences.en: After that painful scene the quiet of nature was wonderfully poignant.
sentences.cn: 经过适才痛苦的一幕,大自然的静穆特别给人一种清新的感觉.

sentences.en: All things were known eternally and were poignant in their transiency.
sentences.cn: 世间万物都是永恒可知的,即使稍纵即逝.

sentences.en: Full of entertaining and original characters, each two part story is warm, poignant and life-affirming, enjoying humour whilst exploring the darkness that underpins each crime mystery.
sentences.cn: 充满娱乐性和原创性字符，每两个部分的故事是温暖的，尖锐的，肯定生命，享受幽默，同时探索在黑暗中，支持每个犯罪神秘。

sentences.en: Harry thought the sight of her was inexpressibly poignant.
sentences.cn: 哈里觉得看到她有种难以言喻的哀伤。

sentences.en: His lyrics are as acerbic and poignant as they ever have been.
sentences.cn: 他的歌词一如既往的犀利辛辣。

sentences.en: I could not erase from my mind the poignant thought.
sentences.cn: 我无法驱散萦绕在我心头的痛切之感.

sentences.en: I found the scene in which Percy proposed to Olive tremendously poignant.
sentences.cn: 我觉得珀西向奥利芙求婚的一幕太让人心酸了。

sentences.en: I looked , and had an acute pleasure in looking - a precious yet poignant pleasure.
sentences.cn: 我看了, 看的时候有一种剧烈的欢乐, -- 一种宝贵的,然而辛辣的欢乐.

sentences.en: In her memoir, Klein offers a relentlessly funny yet poignant take on her journey to womanhood and beyond.
sentences.cn: 在她的回忆录中，克莱因对其作为女性以及未来的生活旅程进行了尖锐而有趣的审视。

sentences.en: It is especially poignant that he died on the day before his wedding.
sentences.cn: 他在婚礼前一天去世了,这尤其令人伤感.

sentences.en: Most of them spoke of those bygone times with poignant regret.
sentences.cn: 大多数人带着沉痛惋惜的语调谈论着过去的一切.

sentences.en: Rather than pandering to younger readers, she poured out a poignant tale with the most beautiful language.
sentences.cn: 作者没有刻意迎合年轻读者，而是用最美的笔触纵情描绘出寓意深刻的故事。

sentences.en: Some of their lesser - known ballads are surprisingly poignant.
sentences.cn: 但是他们一些不是太出名的民谣歌曲却是出奇的刺激的.

sentences.en: The case of Kologrivov was even more poignant.
sentences.cn: 科罗格利沃夫的事更令人心疼.

sentences.en: The imagined grief was so poignant that Bertha burst into tears.
sentences.cn: 想象的悲恸是如此强烈,使伯莎泪如泉涌.

words.tran_cn: 深刻地；辛辣地；令人辛酸地
尖锐的；辛酸的；深刻的；切中要害的

trans.tran_cn: 悲惨的，辛酸的，令人痛苦的
trans.tran_en: Something that is poignant affects you deeply and makes you feel sadness or regret
